Katie Hyatt

View My GitHub Profile

I'm a condensed matter physics grad student at UC Santa Barbara. I contribute to the Julia language. Mostly I focus on improving Julia's testing infrastructure and writing tests for Julia. I add documentation occasionally as well. I have a Julia package of my own, CUSPARSE.jl, which provides a Julia wrapper around the NVIDIA CUSPARSE sparse linear algebra library.
